name: Super Hammy - the iPhone game
blurb: An action-arcade iPhone game where you control a fat, furry little hamster with super powers!

rewards.reward: Super Hammy will forever hold you close to his heart and to prove it he will send you a Hi Res digital poster of himself.  What a guy!
Access to the beta and a copy of Super Hammy for the iPhone and everything listed above.

A copy of Super Hammy for the iPad when it becomes available.  (I'm hoping to have the iPad version completed in approximately one month after I ship the iPhone version).  And everything listed above.

An exclusive Hi Res digital poster of Super Hammy and Wood Chip together.  This poster will be the very first appearance of Wood Chip.  You will also receive some behind the scenes images of Super Hammy and Wood Chip including renderings of their 3D models at various stages of development and the animation process used to bring them to life.  And everything listed above.

An exclusive short animation (15-20 seconds) of Super Hammy performing one of his special powers in full high definition and a special code to unlock the hidden Super Hammy (see the last pledge for details).  And everything listed above.
Have your name included in the credits right next to Super Hammy's name!

Have an in-game achievement named after you.  (Restrictions do apply so please contact me before pledging to receive full details).  You will also receive everything listed above.  (Excludes all rewards that are limited unless otherwise noted in this Reward Description.)

Receive credit in the game as a Designer.  Super Hammy will send you a breakdown of gameplay requirements for his iPhone game and you will be able to design a location and the enemies Super Hammy will jump and smash.  Within Description under Art and Design you can see locations already being considered to get an idea of what Super Hammy is looking for.  (Restrictions do apply so please contact me before pledging to receive full details).\r\n\r\nYou will also receive everything listed above. (Excludes all rewards that are limited unless otherwise noted in this Reward Description.)

Design an outfit for an unlockable version of Super Hammy.  Maybe you want to see him dressed up like a ninja or in a sequenced white jump suit?  The options are limitless so let you imagination run wild.  (Restrictions do apply so please contact me before pledging to receive full details).

Your design can be submitted as a written description, a crude illustration on lined paper or a concept drawing if you  got skillz!  You will also receive a Hi Res digital poster of Super Hammy in the outfit you designed.

In addition you will receive in game credit as a Designer.  You will also have an in-game achievement named after you and a special code sent to you.   This code will unlock your Super Hammy.  And everything list above. (Excludes all rewards that are limited unless otherwise noted in this Reward Description.)

In game ad located on the bus that Super Hammy runs across.  You can see the bus at approximately 20 seconds into the video.  The color of the bus will be made to match your companies color scheme and your logo will be placed on the side of the bus.  For people interested in having more control over the final look I can also supply a template of the layout of the bus for specific placement of logos and color schemes. (Restrictions do apply so please contact me before pledging to receive full details).\r\n\r\nYou will also receive an exclusive Hi Res digital poster of Super Hammy running across your bus along with you or your company's name listed in the credits and everything listed above.  (Excludes all rewards that are limited unless otherwise noted in this Reward Description.)
